hero.title: Our Courses
hero.description: Explore our wide range of courses designed to help you succeed.

courses.title: Introduction to Web Development
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build modern websites.

courses.title: Advanced React Techniques
courses.description: Dive deep into React, learning about hooks, context, and performance optimization.

courses.title: UI/UX Design Principles
courses.description: Master the art of creating beautiful and user-friendly interfaces.

courses.title: Backend with Node.js
courses.description: Build scalable and efficient server-side applications with Node.js and Express.

courses.title: Data Science with Python
courses.description: Explore data analysis, visualization, and machine learning using Python.

courses.title: Mobile App Development
courses.description: Create cross-platform mobile apps for iOS and Android using React Native.
